Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Confidently activate your AI agent estate with Microsoft Agent 365. Whether an assistive agent or fully autonomous digital worker, learn how Agent 365 provides comprehensive security and governance to help you manage AI access and agent sprawl, prevent data oversharing and leaks, defend against AI threats and vulnerabilities, and comply with AI regulations.

Chapters: 0:00 - Irina introduces co-speakers Shilpa and Kim and contextualizes AI agents trend 00:00:52 - Security concerns with AI agents and need for control and oversight 00:13:02 - Protecting agent access with conditional access policies 00:18:10 - Overview of new security challenges with AI agents 00:23:52 - Admin reviews agent activity, DLP matches, and event traceability 00:25:42 - Purview Audit captures all agent interactions ensuring regulatory compliance 00:31:11 - Investigation begins on low-priority collection incident involving an agent 00:35:16 - Exploring security recommendations and remediation steps for AI agents 00:36:21 - Reviewing attack path visualization and potential lateral movement risks
Title: Explore Microsoft Agent 365 security and governance capabilities | BRK269
